subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Continuing his late season revival, the Mercedes driver Nico Rosberg won a ferocious battle with his teammate Lewis Hamilton, who has beaten him to the drivers' title two years in a row.
snippet: Continuing his late season revival, the Mercedes driver Nico Rosberg won a ferocious battle with his teammate Lewis Hamilton, who has beaten him to the drivers' title two years in a row.
